briefTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluating the Role of Exercise in Women Undergoing Treatment for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluating the Role of Exercise in Women Undergoing Treatment for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with unilateral breast cancer
* Age 18-65 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic breast cancer
* Pregnant Women
* Women with physical limitations to perform exercises
* Previous history of cancer
